metadata.description: Specifies the Azure location where the identity will be created.

properties.arguments: [concat('-appName', ' ', concat('\"', 'azure-ad-app-', parameters('utcValue'), '\"'), ' ', '-subscriptionName', ' ', concat('\"', subscription().displayName, '\"'), ' ', '-azureUserId', ' ', concat('\"', parameters('azureUserId'), '\"'), ' ', '-azureUserPassword', ' ', concat('\"', parameters('azureUserPassword'), '\"'))]
properties.scriptContent:
Install-Module -Name "Az.Accounts" -Force
$PWord = ConvertTo-SecureString -String $azureUserPassword -AsPlainText -Force
$User = $azureUserId
$Credential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList $User, $PWord
Connect-AzAccount -Credential $Credential
Import-Module Az.Resources
$randomString = -join (((48..57)+(65..90)+(97..122)) * 80 |Get-Random -Count 24 |%{[char]$_})
$spcredentials = New-Object Microsoft.Azure.Commands.ActiveDirectory.PSADPasswordCredential -Property @{StartDate=Get-Date; EndDate=Get-Date -Year 2024; Password=$randomString}
$ServicePrincipal = New-AzAdServicePrincipal -DisplayName ServicePrincipalName -PasswordCredential $spcredentials
Start-Sleep -s 30
New-AzRoleAssignment -ApplicationId $ServicePrincipal.ApplicationId -RoleDefinitionName 'Contributor'
$appClientSecret = $randomString
$tenantID = (Get-AzSubscription -SubscriptionName $subscriptionName).TenantId
$appClientID = $ServicePrincipal.ApplicationId
$DeploymentScriptOutputs = @{}
$DeploymentScriptOutputs['tenantID'] = $tenantID
$DeploymentScriptOutputs['appClientID'] = $appClientID
$DeploymentScriptOutputs['appClientSecret'] = $appClientSecret
